name: incomprehensibly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is impossible or extremely difficult to understand: The election remains almost incomprehensibly close. He mumbled incomprehensibly. See
incomprehensible
More examplesFewer examplesThe landscape is changing quickly and incomprehensibly as more and more houses are built.Earth exists in an incomprehensibly huge universe, with more worlds than we could ever know. There's an incomprehensibly long list of things that could go wrong during the rocket launch.
